LanguageData.NLFUWU_LightningFlashDurationMaxToolTip: Adjust to set the maximum duration for the map-wide flash effect during lightning strikes. Setting this to 0 will ensure the flash does not happen at all.\n\n(Requires a reload of the save or new map gen.)
LanguageData.NLFUWU_LightningShadowFlashToolTip: Toggle off to ensure the map-wide flash effect does not affect shadows.\n\n(Requires a reload of the save or new map gen.)
